content.detailedDescription: Watching tv in 2nd story bedroom. heard dogs barking like sum1 was in the house. looked out my window, that's when the lazer red light filled my room, but it wasn't shinning through my window, it was like the light was coming from inside my room. i cld feel the redish light, but it's hard to put it into words. absolutely the most vivid red i've ever seen, it was like a completely new color that seemed to slow my thinking and movement. i armed myself with a knife and flashlight to go down and investigate. walked onto the front porch and that's when i saw an enormous craft hovering still roof height. the light didn't seem to come directly from the craft, it was like the air around the craft had turned an extremely bright and vivid red. i shined my light on it but it didn't move or reflect the light. after a few mins of shock and awe, it flew approximately 50ft up, and within 1-2 seconds it traveled north faster than anything i've ever witnessed. the whole time i cldnt hear any noise from it at all.
content.summary: Saw and felt an incredible red light. like the color of a red lazer. dogs went crazy, i investigated, observed giant craft hovering for approximately  20min.

content.detailedDescription: This was just south of the intersection of 128th and james st. i was walking home from work and i saw the shadow. it is kind of boomerang shaped with jagged edges. sort of a check mark, longer on one side. it appeared to be slightly larger than a person and absolutely nothing about it moved separate from the whole thing, not even the frayed edges at the end. first i thought, bat then hawk then i wasn't sure because it was big and didn't appear to have moving parts. maybe a turkey buzzard?  wrote down the time in my phone and that made me think maybe it was phantom shadows because the intersection was pretty busy and there is a signal and street light. while i was looking at my phone i caught it reappear in a clearing in the treetops. i caught it out of the corner of my eye and it appeared to be almost wispy, like a cloud. the shape was longer and seemed less there but i caught it out of the corner of my eye. this thing moved from west to east away from a busy area with open businesses. it felt a little unreal, like being in an eighties movie. it felt like bad graphics on sky. maybe there's some video footage from a business? i didn't hear anything because i was wearing earbuds and listening to music. just my music. i walked home from work and seemed fairly uneventful besides some really weird screeching downtown, once to the east of 13th and maple and again to the west of 15th and maple, almost like a bunny dying or at least how i imagined a bunny dying sounds. i passed a black cat that really wanted inside the button cam shop and i don't blame him. the sounds were at about 12:05 am.
content.summary: Black object above treetop

content.detailedDescription: Yes viewed by multiple visitors to my home, here every night so far for about 3 weeks (+).  we called it in to police, and they showed us through their binoculars the colors are like a rainbow and pulsate but are blurry and it is spherical.  what caught our eye was it was changing colors to the naked eye and not moving.  the while we were watching it we saw a burst of smoke the shape of a crescent moon blow out the side (to our left of the object standing facing the object) and it did this 2 times. we also saw small short beams of light burst out the bottom briefly.  the night we noticed it there were falling stars falling in the direction of the object.  we also saw beams of light where no airport exists toward elizabeth city, nc area, but it didn't appear to be coming from the city (glow on the horizon where the cities are located is how we know where everything is in the distance of our location).  the object is hovering approximately west of a local airport.  also very close to norfolk i believe they are watching our naval bases.  we have seen similar objects more than one at a time in different locations in the same regions every night, but they don't show up constantly like this one does.  also heard a very loud pulsating noise outside while i was in bed, when i got up to investigate i looked out my bedroom window, and my hearing suddenly started to weaken, and i was having trouble seeing, and i had the feeling of a headache coming on, but when the noise left my headache was gone.  my son's girlfriend also heard the noise, so loud she could hear it above her ipad she was watching.  we both went outside to investigate and saw the lights again in the sky, but this time it was southwest region of the sky.  one night i also saw an object fly over the tree line straight towards my house, and i saw it because i was going out to have a cigarette, but i didn't turn on the light, just opened the door in my bedroom and stepped out on to the deck and it headed toward my house for a few seconds and then quickly changed course and went in the north direction. i can't remember if i heard any sound, but i don't think i did.  it quickly disappeared. that object looked kind of triangular to me and had the same bright multicolored lights on it. there are several bases in this region:  norfolk, va beach, and a nuclear plant in surry, va.  there may be more bases than i listed as this is a hub for the east coast for the navy, marines, air force & army (yorktown & newport news), navy air base...  i seriously think they are watching our bases.  i believe there is an army base south of us off i95 in nc.
content.summary: Same place every night, never moves w/ stars, then will just disappear eventually, sometimes when it disappears a we see other ones in different locations but always in the same regions and don't move just hover, saw through powerful binoculars the light

content.detailedDescription:
I just got off work around 10-10:30pm on 9/13/2016
when i decided to drive around my home neighborhood. i occssionally play the "pokemon go" game for cell phones & that's why i drove around my neighborhood (to see what creatures appear). as i drovr to jacobs elementary school, i noticed 4 odd lights coming from above the treeline near the school. i immediately take a couple of pics with my cellphone & a short 2min video capturing the event. they were all orange/red objects that made no sound whatsoever & flew over my head. they seemed to be just a few hundred feet or less above me & they headed in a n/nw direction from where i stopped. they just cleared the treeline nearby as they disappeared in the distance. afterwards i drove home & informed my brother of what just happened.
content.summary: Driving through neighborhood near home & saw strange lights near school.

content.detailedDescription: Going to my truck to get items needed. i noticed a large blinking red light, i though it was a planet (mars) until it changed colors , (spinning erratically changing colors). i went in the house and told my family. six adults came out to observed trying to draw out conclusions to no avail. we stood watching it for 30 min until feeling uneasy . went back inside the house feeling drained and tired.
content.summary: Rapid sequence of stationary spinning multicolored light .

content.detailedDescription: A large row of 4-5 aspirin sized lights appeared, then vanished. a singular sized light then appeared in the other side of the sky. vanished within a few seconds. for about 3 1/2 minutes after the initial sighting of the larger lights, small blinking lights (5-6)were in the sky. they were moving in no logical direction and would disappear, only to reappear seconds later. a low rumble was heard during the entire time.
content.summary: Row of large lights. small lights moving around.

content.detailedDescription:
On a fourth of july picnic party at my sister's...I was simply just laying in the sun on a lawn chair. not looking or thinking of anything in the sky i just happened to look upward and i seen what i described to my friends and family immediately as a "cloaked" ufo. i called it cloaked because although i could not see the physical make-up of the ship...I could see an outline. the outline drew my attention only because i could actually see motion. it looked like a part of the sky (because it refleted the blue of the sky in what i imagine is the "cloaking" action) and at the same time this wave like motion was around it. i seen it for seconds and only looked away to say sonething to my sister and cousin. when i tried to see this "cloaked" craft i could not get a fix on it. which doesnt surprise me as it was obviously not really wanting to be seen. i just so happened to look up at the right time i supose. 

thank you for your website and giving me the ability to share my sighting to you folks. i do know we are not alone. and mufon is a site that makes me feel like my sighting will be taken seriously even without video....Dont think my family really knew what to think.
content.summary: Was laying out on lawn chair at a july 4th picnic. happened to look up and seen a "cloaked" disc.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my porch swing, smoking a cigarette. out of the corner of my eye, i noticed a shiny object in the sky. i immediately focused on on it, as there was no vapor trail, nor sound. i watched it moving across the sky, slowly descending. there was no wings, so i zoomed in with my camera to confirm it was not a plane. it seemed that it was getting further and further away and then i lost sight of it because it was going down into the trees. not even a minute later, a second one appeared with the same exact qualities as the first. it was going in the same direction and descended into the trees as well. i was extremely intrigued as i have witnessed ufos before, and it's a very interesting thing to think about.
content.summary: It was very short but i caught it just before it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 4 am sitting around campfire. 4 males. 2 of the males facing the house in the backyard of one of the witnesses. they both looked up and seen a craft about twice the height of nearby 70ft trees noticed it looked just like a cobras snake head shape. 2 bright white lights immitted straight down evenly apart under craft. the 2 guys said did you see that. but by the time the other 2 guys turned and look up the craft took off straight north faster than a jet. apparent size was 50-100ft across. distance 200-300ft away. absolutely no sound came from craft. one witness described it looking more like a spacecraft than a jet. description of cobra shape and lights in attached sketch.
content.summary: Cobra shaped craft almost directly overhead. 4 people sitting around campfire. 2 witnessed craft over house, before craft took off faster than a jet. no noise emmitted.

content.detailedDescription:
It'a a personal report from my close family mmember right after the observation.

my brother was smoking near the opened window with his neighbour.
while they were talking to each other he noticed tow small and green light objects that were hovering and flying in the circle pattern above the ground right under the nearest trees.
at the first look he thought that this might be two pretty quiet small drones (because he is in possession of the simillar one in noise emission).
these two objects were flying slowly above the grass for over 20-30 minutes dissappearing behind the trees from time to time. he realized what these objects really are when they ascended up to the sky with terrifynig speed. he was shocked to the point that he couldn't pull out his phone to take a picture. he managed to take only a few pictures of that object. when these objects shoot up to the sky they stopped at the height between 100 - 300 meters. one of the lights has splitted into two identic light balls and right after that one of the two splitted flew away with amazing speed. right after that two remain has exploded by turning itself into a kind of green mist-cloud thing which started to "regenerate" and turning into bigger green light which released many smaller lights that formed a huge triangle which flew away towards a different direction than a small light ball. whole situation was completly noiseless. from the moment of ascending to disappearring about 10-15 seconds has passed. the picture shows the moment of turning into that "mist", releasing the lights and forming triangle.
content.summary: Two green lights hovering above the ground. then striking above the sky to multiple and right after turning into the light triangle flying away

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed the crafts/large lights for four consecutive days so far, one sighted by my daughter at 6pm 13 september. from saturday 10th september 2016, the light have been seen at different times. 10 september 7pm, 11th september 8pm, 12th september 8pm and today at 9.15 til about 10pm. then they vanished.
content.summary: Three large lights/crafts in the sky

content.detailedDescription: At around 10:30 pm on september 4th, 2016, i was having a fire in my friends backyard when i noticed two small orange orbs of light travelling horizontally across the sky. at first, i believed it to be two helicopters, but realized not because the lights were not blinking and made no noise. these orbs appeared to have an altitude of several thousand feet and were travelling at a consistent speed of 70-100 mph, often appearing speed up or slow down. about 60 sec later, a third orange orb followed and was travelling on the exact same path as the first two. three more orange orbs followed in 60 second intervals, respectively. i believe these orbs were intelligently controlled due to the fact that they appeared to be travelling in a single file, and in organized succession. i was no longer able to observe these lights after they flew behind a tree.
content.summary: 6 small orange orbs travelling horizontally on identical paths. appeared to be going 70-100 mph. distance between lights were evenly spaced.

content.detailedDescription:
Out observing the moon through a telescope and taking pictures. after adjusting the picture, i had to readjust the telescope back on the moon and saw craft unlike anything i have ever seen before absolutely not a plane or a satellite and absolutely not within our atmosphere. passed in front of the moon as i was adjusting. whatever it was it moved at a high rate of speed and from my point of view, was silent,though i am a great distance from where the obect was.
because it passed in front of the moon it was black from the back light. when it did pass in front of the moon i noticed a dome light on top that blink once.I took my eye off the eyepiece i tried to spot it but that was not possible with the naked eye. it was extremely long with a boxy front end and a boxy rear end and obviously moved at a high rate of speed.
and i opening experience, i actually had chills and had to run in to tell my wife. i am located in southern norway about 1 hour south of oslo.
i only wish i had snapped a picture as it was passing.
content.summary: very long, a huge crafts with a boxy front end and a boxy rear end one light on the top that flashed

content.detailedDescription: My son took a picture of an airplane with his iphone while we were stuck in traffic as i was taking him to school. he only saw a plane in the sky but when he looked at the picture, there appears to be an object some distance below it. i looked at his camera lens and there is was no dust on it.
content.summary: Ufo under airplane

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the second floor of a two storie apartment. at 3:55am tuesday september13 2016 i woke up to a feeling of fear & apprehension.It was as if i was beeing treatended by something or someone.I turned on the lights & thought i must have had a nightmare.I got out of bed & turned on the tv & lit a cigarette .At 4:05 am i got a sudden hurge to look out my back door (it was like someone telling to look out side).It was a very clear night & cool (not sure of the exact temperture but weather network was calling for 10c)at that point i noticed there were a lot if stars vissible .I could easily see orions belt in the south east.At about 70 degrees or so from my piont of view .As i continued to scan the skies (as i always do) i noticed what i thouth was venus then i saw it change colers from green to blue-green with red lights rotating side to side of the object.Ivery kwickly crabed my binocculars to get a closer look.That is whan i saw it was droping or shooting white balls light that seamed to disapeer within 4 to 5 seconds i watched this object hover & move from side to side for almost an hour as it moved & hovered sometimes dimming it mai have bin moving away * then cooming closser .It seam to be looking for something & perhaps surveying the area it was over .I lost sight of the object ater it dimmed out out site.
it was not completly boomerang shaped but was more like a half circle & its size is very hard to estimate i can only say that it was well over a 100 feet long from my point of view 
i also noticed other very dim lights in the back ground i think where meteors but also worth mentioning.
the thing that has me a little worried is waking up with fear & apprehension & that sudden"strong" urge to look out my back door.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green, green blue with red moving lights object spoted in gatineau qc

content.detailedDescription: We were laying down on our seats in our caravan in the dark looking out of our sky light watching for shooting stars, my husband was laid oppistit side to me looking in a different direction when he first sat up saying what he had just witnessed , as he was telling me i was still looking and then that's when i saw a object that had a glow around it and looked like a oval spear !! that had a tall of light behind it , it seemed to be going straight across the sky over our window, it must have been a large object because it also seemed quite high up in the sky. the sky was very clear and lots of stars where out, also we saw several shooting stars that's what we were looking for at the time, we were very shocked and must say we have neither seen anything like this..! we have not told any family or friends what we saw and still question what we did see and have been watching the sky since. i hope this makes sence and i myself have had a vivid dream and could see the same object that i saw that night .
content.summary: Laying down in my caravan and looking up through a sky light in the dark and a object flew past and then came back over our van

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture of the sunsetting and the sphere appeared in the picture.
content.summary: Took a picture of the sun and this appeared in the picture

content.detailedDescription: My friend was visiting the pyramids in mexico and taking photographs and discovered a strange object in one of the photos hovering above the site. (was not seen in person at time of pictures were taken)
content.summary: Was discovered in photograph from vacation pictures

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were hiking and had reached anderson pass, the saddle next to king's peak, which is the highest peak in utah.  the area is very remote.   i stood on the saddle and took pictures of the horizon in every direction.   when i got home and, three weeks later, was viewing the pictures on my large computer screen, i noticed this object in the sky.   i can't describe it as anything other than a ufo.
content.summary: Ufo discovered while viewing hiking photos after the fact

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was about 7:10pm atlantic time and i was a passenger in a vehicle driving on the highway (highway 103 ns) into upper tantallon, coming from halifax, roughly 4 mins before the exit onto hammond's plains rd. the pyramid-shaped object was stationary in the sky directly in front of us and a smidge to the right of centre through the windshield, above the horizon, but not up in the clouds. it appeared distant but quite large and more reflective of the sun than anything i've ever seen before. i might be a bit off with the shape description as it reflected the light to the point where the edges were obscured. i pointed it out to the driver (who had been focused on the road, but easily found it when he looked up) and he also couldn't figure out what it was. it remained completely stationary for over a minute as we drove toward it and i joked that maybe it was a ufo, expecting to figure out what it was as we got closer. as i watched without looking away, it very, very quickly receded into the distance, directly opposite of where we were and was half the size it first was within a second, then completely vanished within one more. there was no sign of it after that. it either took off at an incredibly high speed or shrank to nothing before my eyes as it did not appear to travel laterally from our position. 

the driver and i cannot explain what we witnessed or identify it as any of the other objects one would expect to see in the sky. this was not a plane or balloon, not a drone or anything else i know of.
content.summary: Highly reflective triangularish object hovering stationary then receded very, very fast to vanishing point.

content.detailedDescription: While driving to work, at around 3:40am, i noticed a bright blue green orb appeared in sky. it  started to fall from sky in what seemed like a controlled manner. .  it appeared to stay glowing until i lost sight of it on its decent due to hills and geography. the whole event lasted about 3-6 seconds.
content.summary: While driving a bright blue green orb appeared in sky then "fell" from sky.  it appeared to stay glowing until i lost it on its decent.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this white saucer on my way home (i was walking) and i saw it descending before leaving my line of sight behind some houses, i would imagine that it would have landed in one of the fields on the opposite side of the highway (i live next to a highway). what is really unusual is that at least once a week i see black military helicopters searching the fields. my house is on an ex raf base and i was at the end of my street.
content.summary: Unusual saucer shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I put my video camera on a tripod in my front yard at a 45 degree angle and programed it to record 15 seconds every 15 minutes. the enclosed video has the objects at actual speed, at slow motion, a still shot and a close up of the still. i schedule recordings 3 to 4 times a week. i believe these objects are in flying rod and orb categories. the objects seem to ascend in evening, fly level in the middle night and descend in the early mornings.
content.summary: Ufo’s recorded in my yard by a infra-red video camera.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 7pm and my son and i went out to see if we could see the nasa launch towards the west from cape canaveral which is around 40 miles away. we couldn't see the launch just some smoke trails left behind and looking north - north east i saw what i initially thought was a plane flying very high up. my son did not see the object but i was watching it and noticed it looked spherical in shape and was moving along a straight path then stopped. it sped up and slowed down and moved quite fast. it would hover and move pretty erratically. i have seen drones in this area before and i myself own a drone so i'm pretty familiar with their flight patterns to know if this was a drone, this looked to be too high up and moved too fast and seemed to be quite large from my perspective. i only observed the object for around a minute before pulling my phone out and recording the short video at which point my daughter was crying from inside. i didn't check the footage until later that night and realized that whatever i saw was definitely strange and could be something of unknown origin. 

the object looked metallic, moved quickly, stopped quickly and had very erratic flight behavior. looked to be the size of a passenger airline high up in the sky, i would estimate around 1k-2k ft. altitude.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed metallic type craft flying.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house and i have to walk down a path leading to a cannal it was about 10pm when i got to the dark part of the journey a bright light shon on me from directly above me i looked up and the light was really bright so i couldnt make out what it was i thought it was a police helicopter at first but when my eyes came back in to focus i realised it was not anything i had seen before then the light pulsated next thing i knew i was inside the ufo i was lying on a table the only way to describe it is a cross between metal/stone i looked down and had a tube coming from my bellybutton up to the celling there was 1 stood next to me and said "are you not scared" i replied "why should i be" it said no obviousley i didnt belive that and punched it in the face then more appeared restrained me (but never tried to hurt me) then gave me a shot(needle) then i was drowzey they had me doing maths and science tests they was looking for something called umantrium or umantainium something like that then they put me back unhurt about half a mile from where they took me i woke up in a car park next mornning
content.summary: It was silent it was about 2 houses high 4 houses accross dark silver in colour

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed when i noticed a bright light thru the window. i went up, looked out the window and saw a very bright, white thing hovering high up in the air near the nuclear power station. first i thought it was a star but i then realised that it was way brighter than all the other stars. it also wasn't an airplane, because the light wasn't flashing like an airplanelight would do. it started to lower a bit and then the light slowly disappeared. when i looked at it about 10 seconds before it disappeared tears came out of my eyes and i couldnt see it clearly anymore. the first reaction after that was to think clearly about what happened. i then took my phone and wrote this report.
content.summary: Bright white light sitting stationary, then slowly disappeart.

content.detailedDescription: It was fist captured under the moon and within 5 minutes it wa up beside the over top of the moon, and it was closer than any airplane i've ever seen, i watched for at least and hrlor close to it, and i witness ufo sightings every night i choose to go out and call out to them telepathically. then they come, but i don't have the equipment to capture them all but i have plenty of video and photo evidence on nimerous sightings i have had, but i wish i could get someone here to see it for theirsekfs, i am not lying iland i can prove it to anyone who wishes to come and see for there self the fourth picture i uploaded is i a sighting i had in the middle of the day
content.summary: Trianguler object with 3 lifhts on the botom of the craft,

content.detailedDescription: We were laying down on our seats in our caravan in the dark looking out of our sky light watching for shooting stars, my husband was laid oppistit side to me looking in a different direction when he first sat up saying what he had just witnessed , as he was telling me i was still looking and then that's when i saw a object that had a glow around it and looked like a oval spear !! that had a tall of light behind it , it seemed to be going straight across the sky over our window, it must have been a large object because it also seemed quite high up in the sky. the sky was very clear and lots of stars where out, also we saw several shooting stars that's what we were looking for at the time, we were very shocked and must say we have neither seen anything like this..! we have not told any family or friends what we saw and still question what we did see and have been watching the sky since. i hope this makes sence and i myself have had a vivid dream and could see the same object that i saw that night .
content.summary: Laying down in my caravan and looking up through a sky light in the dark and a object flew past and then came back over our van

content.detailedDescription: i was up letting the dogs outside as i do every night. it was clear and dark so i got my chair and looked for falling stars.Almost overhead looking at a small star cluster like a very small dipper,i saw two stars straight in line blinking.There was about three inches in apparent distance between the lights,making it very long at that distance.The white lights blinked several times then the bottem light moved to the right and up makeing the shape change directions,blinked a couple times got dim and went away. the object looked just like stars but a little brighter and closer.They just appeared and lasted about ten seconds. other than the lights blinking and the bottom light moving right and up there was no movement.It looked like the lights were connected  as one object.It could have two objects in very straight formation but i don"t think so.I have flown in aircraft as a crew-man many years and this is the first time i think i have seen somthing as a ufo,of this world or not.The distance the blinking and changing direction but no forward movment very much stood out as nothing normal.I think the object was very large and long but i could not see a distinct object.I stayed out hopeing to see it again but no luck.I will look again tonight.
content.summary: Two star like lights in line flashing three times, bottom light then moved horizontal,flashed twice,very high alt.Looked very big no body seen

content.detailedDescription:
This was an identical sighting to the one reported 8/26/16 in a totally different part of the sky.

my husband saw it first, got me, i got my daughter and we all agreed.

there were 2 airplanes seen far east heading north and the other headed sw during the sighting.

i took out my iphone and camera and took a few fuzzy photos and videos (most show the ufo between 5 and 7 seconds into the video)

i came in to download the photos and went to bed.

due to the poor internet connection, the photos and videos are not uploading. perhaps i can send them differently to mufon. 

i'll try to do just one or two.
content.summary: Identical sighting to the one reported 8/26/16 in different part of the sky
